connect.question: How do I connect my Facebook or Instagram account?
connect.answer: From the login page, choose Facebook or Instagram and approve access. Once connected, your pages and accounts appear in the dashboard.

missingPages.question: Why don't I see my pages or accounts?
missingPages.answer: Make sure you are an admin on the page and that the Instagram business account is linked to Facebook. Then refresh the list in settings.

moderation.question: How does moderation work?
moderation.answer: We analyze comments with AI and apply the action you selected (hide or delete). You can change these settings anytime.

faqRules.question: How do I update intelligent FAQ replies?
faqRules.answer: Open your Facebook or Instagram settings and add, edit, or remove FAQ rules.

history.question: Where can I see moderated comments?
history.answer: Go to the Comments page in your dashboard to review actions and filters.

cgv.intro: These Terms of Sale (CGV) govern subscription and payment for Bedones Moderator services. They complement the Terms of Service and apply to any order.

sections.title: 1. Scope
paragraphs: These Terms of Sale define the conditions for purchasing subscriptions to the Bedones Moderator service.
They apply to any customer subscribing to a paid plan, whether acting as a professional or a consumer.

sections.title: 2. Service offering and availability
paragraphs: The features are described on the website and may evolve to improve the service.
We may temporarily suspend access for maintenance or updates, and will inform the customer when possible.

sections.title: 3. Pricing
paragraphs: Prices are indicated in euros and displayed before order confirmation, inclusive or exclusive of taxes as applicable.
Bedones Moderator may update its prices; new prices apply on renewal or new orders.

sections.title: 4. Payment
paragraphs: Payment is made by bank card or any other method offered at checkout.
The subscription is confirmed after payment is validated. If payment fails, access may be suspended.

sections.title: 5. Billing and renewal
paragraphs: Subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis depending on the plan.
Unless canceled, the subscription renews automatically at each term.
Invoices are available in the customer account or sent by email.

sections.title: 6. Right of withdrawal
paragraphs: If you are a consumer, you have 14 days to exercise your right of withdrawal, unless the service has started with your consent.
Professionals do not benefit from a right of withdrawal unless required by law.

sections.title: 7. Cancellation
paragraphs: You may cancel at any time from your customer area or by contacting support.
Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current period; no partial refunds are provided unless required by law.

sections.title: 8. Customer obligations
paragraphs: By using the service, you agree to:
items: Maintain the required access (Facebook or Instagram accounts) for the service to operate.
Comply with applicable laws and platform rules.

sections.title: 9. Liability
paragraphs: Bedones Moderator is subject to a best-efforts obligation; the service is provided "as is".
We are not liable for indirect damages or loss of revenue related to the use of the service.

sections.title: 10. Support
paragraphs: Support is available by email at support@bedones.com.
We aim to respond within 24 to 48 business hours.

sections.title: 11. Personal data
paragraphs: Personal data processing is described in our Privacy Policy.
By using the service, you accept these processing activities.

sections.title: 12. Governing law and disputes
paragraphs: These Terms of Sale are governed by French law.
In case of dispute, the parties will seek an amicable solution before any legal action.
